price: 55. Kuwa gaaloobana ma deyn doonaan inay shaki ka qabaan (Qur’aankani) jeer ay Saacdda (Qiyaame) ugu timaaddo kedis ama u timaado cadaab Maalin daran oo maalin kale ka dambeyn17.
arabic: وَلَا يَزَالُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي مِرۡيَةٖ مِّنۡهُ حَتَّىٰ تَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ بَغۡتَةً أَوۡ يَأۡتِيَهُمۡ عَذَابُ يَوۡمٍ عَقِيمٍ
footnotes: 17. Maalin daran oo ma dhaleys ah waa maalin aan habeen ka dambeyn, sidaas darteed aan dhali doonin maalin cusub, waxaana loola jeedaa Maalinta Qiyaamaha

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walā yazālu alladhīna kafarū fī mir'yatin min'hu ḥattā tatiyahumu al-sāʿatu baghtatan aw yatiyahum ʿadhābu yawmin ʿaqīmin
